sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import axios from 'axios'; const BlogAdd = () => { const user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user')) console.log("THE USER AFTER LOGIN: ", user) const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ username: user.username, title: "", content: "", category: "", file: null, }); const[errorMessage, setErrorMessage] = useState(null) const showError=(message)=>{ setErrorMessage(message) setTimeout(()=>{ setErrorMessage(null) },3000) } const handleSubmit= async (e) =>{ e.preventDefault() try { const response = await axios.post('http://127.0.0.1:8000/login/', { }); const access_token = response.data.access const refresh_token = response.data.refresh localStorage.setItem('refresh_token', refresh_token) localStorage.setItem('access_token', access_token); localStorage.setItem('user', JSON.stringify(response.data.user)) //Comments console.log(response) console.log(response.data.user) navigate('/') } catch (error) { showError(error.message) console.error('Login Failed:', error.message); } } useEffect(() => { // can add the part to fetch categories from the backend }, []); return (

Hi {user.username}

{/*

This information will be displayed publicly so be careful what you share.

*/}
{ setFormData({ ...formData, title: e.target.value }); }} />

Write your blog content here.

{/*

or drag and drop

PNG, JPG, GIF up to 10MB

*/}
); }; export default BlogAdd;
